issue.title: [C++] Review hardcoded "lib" paths in Find$PACKAGE.cmake related to endogenous libraries
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5021](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5021). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4024#discussion_r269200888. We should try to use a more portable pattern for finding these libraries (in the event that libraries are installed in `lib64`, for example)
